reg.title: Additional Tax Regulation (City of Vancouver)

section.marginalnote: Application in the City of Vancouver of section 3 of the Act
section.sectiontext: Section 3 (1) of the Hotel Room Tax Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased within the City of Vancouver.
The additional tax payable under section 3 of the Hotel Room Tax Act applicable to accommodation purchased within the City of Vancouver is 2% of the purchase price of that accommodation.

section.marginalnote: Payment of money raised under this regulation
section.sectiontext: The additional tax paid under section 2 is to be paid to the Greater Vancouver Convention and Visitors Bureau, also known as Tourism Vancouver, and the purposes to which it may expend this tax revenue are

paragraph.paragraphtext: convention centre marketing and tourism promotion, programs and projects, and
the tourism industry's contribution to the expansion of the Vancouver Convention and Exhibition Centre.

content.regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 399/88.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
